WRITING.TEXT: I live in Chico in Northern California and there are bars here that are packed with Chargers fans. More Chargers fans than the local teams by far.

One time for me there was a kid that me and several friends knew from high school. He said he wanted an ounce so my buddy was happy to do it for him since we knew him. We also knew that his brother was a police officer and he comes from a relatively good family (they're black). Anways... The kid and his friend come to meet up with us in a parking lot. I just started getting this sketchy vibe especially since he had a weird friend there acting as a sort of look out. When he approaches the car he asks to smell the weed. The second he gets the bag he pulls out a pistol and decks my friend who was driving in the face with it. We were parked on a hill and when my friend got hit he took his foot off the brake pedal and the car went down the hill and smashed into the car in front of him. Right after, the kid who stole the ounce lets out the loudest of what sounded like a gorilla mating call and took off in a sprint. It was insane. Everybody was just like, "Did that really fucking happen?". Still see the kid around walking the streets. Fuck him. He's a piece of shit.

I go to Chico State. I was a "rebel" as a high school student and Chico was the only school I applied for and happened to get in. I've always been the kind of kid who would never study and get a better grade than the kid next to me who would study his ass off. I really wish that I would have tried harder in high school to get into a UC. I still think I would have been how I am no matter what school I went to. My dream schools were UCLA and UCSB... they still party pretty hard.
I have dated a few girls, I had two "girlfriends". Didn't last more than 6 months though with both of them. I have a really difficult time being with one girl. I just feel I am still young and I only have so much more time until girl's tits start sagging, they gain weight, ect.... My dad's friends always give me advice to sleep with every girl I possibly can even if they are a bit "chubby" because I will wish I did when I am their age.
I am really not despised to death by anyone. I am well liked and my input and values are respected by all my peers. I keep my bros as my main priority because I know they are the ones who will be there for me when things get tough. I am a firm believer in not fucking people over, maintaining honesty, and refusing to lie, cheat and steal. I'm sure I've gotten with a girl that one of my friends really wanted to get with but I would never stab someone in the back if they already had something going on with her.
If you have taken the Myers Briggs personality test I am a ENFP personality. It literally describes me to a T. I just took it last week and am still pretty hyped on the accuracy of it.
Lately I've had a thing for neon green.
Now, I'm hired as an Assistant Project Administrator for a consulting firm in the bay area. Only about a week left in my college town.

There are guys I feel I have better looks than but they can still pull more random chicks in a bar than me because of their height.

You wouldn't know by meeting me though, I come off a lot different than I am actually feeling on the inside.

I have so many crazy stories. Seen a lot of things. I had a party at my house with well over 1000 people, it got out of control and a riot started to break out with kids throwing beer bottles at horse cops while cops were beating kids with their bats. It turned into a riot with couches lit on fire and my house getting about every cop within a 20 mile vicinity at my house trying to break up the party. Really gnarly.
Alcohol poisoning wise, lots of kids fall casualty to it. This year alone 8 kids have died from alcohol poisoning, including two kids that I know. Really sad... our greek system is in huge trouble for it right now. Things definitely aren't the same anymore in my town.
Many kids have died. One kid died on the couch in a back yard of one of my bros houses. Another kid I knew that was in the snowboard club with me died last semester from 21 shots on his 21st birthday. Not very good memories.
I was a good student. I made the dean's list my first two years of college but I have cooled off a little bit. I still have a 3.15 cumulative and am considering the Master's program.
My degree is in Project Management with a minor in Managing for Sustainability. Great major.
I usually talk to my mom about twice a week. Awesome lady. I have a sister that goes to Western Washington in Bellingham. She's a lot different than me to say the least.

At our school, the multi-culturals are involved in Greek life, can play sports and participate in "Greek Week" and other philanthropic events. However, they are only allowed to have socials with multi-cultural sororities. I have a couple friends in them. I don't exactly know, but I feel their rituals do not run as deep, and their history is all very recent. I don't have any hate towards them at all, and honestly some of the Mexican bitches in them are pretty fuckin' sexy. I just feel that I myself would never be interested in joining one.

As a college student in a similar situation, there are a lot of things you can do. Really, what is most important is diet if you want to get the results you are imagining in your head. Healthy eating is thought of as expensive, but can be cheap if you do it the right way. Unfortunately, you will have a lot of days and nights of very boring and routine meal plans, but that is something that you get used to after about a week when you first start seeing results. Staples that I always have in my cupboard and fridge are: Egg whites (comes in a box), brown rice, CHICKEN BREAST, almonds, peanut butter, spinach and all other veggies, various fruits, turkey, cottage cheese, milk, chicken sausage/burgers -- turkey burgers are fine as well. I try at all cost to avoid cheeses and things such as mayo and high fat salad dressings. Remember there are good and bad fats, you want to stick with the natural fats. Also, late night munchies and alcohol are EXTREMELY detrimental to achieving your fitness goals. I do drink on weekends, but I always avoid that beer with my meal on the weekdays. Good luck, train hard, and your goals will be achieved.

WRITING.TITLE: Smoking and Exercise
WRITING.TEXT: Ok, so I am a 22 year old male soon to be college graduate. I have been smoking cigarettes with about the same habit (3-7) per day since I was about 14 depending if I have any drinks or not. I have always been athletic, workout 5-6 days per week and eat extraordinarily healthy. I just picked up the habit when I was really young, being influenced by an older crowd and its something that I have really never been able to kick. I feel this is because I haven't had any negative effects from it (thus far). I have friends that don't smoke and I can still kick their ass in a run. What are your opinions on this? I really want to stop, but there is nothing like enjoying a fine smoke in certain occasions. I need quitting inspiration!! help me!! Anybody in a similar situation?
